subject: Order Issue
description_text:
Hello!

I recently placed an order with you, and I am very excited to try out the
Plus X pedals. I received my shipment a few days ago, and upon opening the
box I noticed that I did not receive the baseplate with my shipment. My
order number is #SSN3905 for the Plus X P2-H2 Black with baseplate.

How can I go about receiving this?

Thank you!
